ActHistoric Sites and Monuments Act
PrecisRe-appointment of RICHARD M. ALWAY, O.C., O.Ont., of Toronto, Ontario, as a member of the Historic Sites and Monuments Board of Canada, as a representative of the Province of Ontario to hold office during pleasure for a period of eight months and his designation as Chairman.
